Are you looking for an unforgettable experience in Masella? Use our official App to make the most of your trip.

The App offers a range of features designed to optimize your experience before, during and after your trip. It’s very simple, plan your getaway and get real time updates on slope conditions. Set up your Skitude profile and track your activities on the slopes to get detailed stats about all your activities. And that’s not all, take part in challenges competing with the whole community, to be in with a chance of winning incredible prizes.

Practical, isn’t it? And you'll be pleased to hear that we offer all this and much more for free.


- REAL-TIME RESORT INFORMATION
Get all the resort information including: interactive maps, snow reports, slope conditions and lift status, as well as webcams, and much more!

- TRACK, COMPETE AND WIN
Set up your Skitude profile to track your activities using the GPS tracker. Find out where you are in the season's rankings and try to complete the challenges to be in with a chance of winning great prizes.

- BOOK YOUR TRIP
Purchase and recharge your ski pass with no need to queue. What's more, book your trip and/or activities in just a few clicks.

- SKITUDE PREMIUM:
Don’t set limits to your experience with Skitude Premium!

> Masella in 3D
Discover a better and faster way to find out about all the ski resort facilities, including: points of interest, slope and lifts, landmarks and other information in 3D.

> Your activity in 3D
After your day, analyse your tracks in 3D. Share your ski experience as never before thanks to our 3D technology!

> Advanced Statistics
Improve your performance by obtaining more accurate statistics. Analyse your day’s ski information such as specific slopes data, breakdown by difficulty or check your own achievements.

> Speed heatmaps
Beat yourself with the heatmaps! Now you will be able to easily analyse your track’s speed profiles.

> Apple watch
Track your activity comfortably without drawing out the mobile phone from your pocket with the Apple watch app.


Live an unforgettable experience with the official app of Masella!

Remember that the App can access your location and GPS information to: send you notifications, process your tracking stats and determine your position in the App rankings, post geo-located photos. Continued use of these features may reduce the duration of your battery.
